item.title: Year of the Tiger Poken
item.description:
February 14th was a significant date, marking not only Valentine’s Day but also the beginning of the Chinese New Year. In the Chinese Zodiac, a 12-animal cycle is used to name the years, including the tiger. The year 2010 is designated as the “Year of the Tiger”. Beyond its association with the tiger, 2010 is poised to be recognized as the “Year of the Poken”. Introduced late last year, the Poken, a social networking device originating in Switzerland, has gained popularity in America...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/year-of-the-tiger-poken/
